generated_doNotEdit.title: Mesa Surface
generated_doNotEdit.description: Similar to overworld_surface. Adds colored strata and optional pillars.

fields.title: sea_floor_depth
fields.description: Controls how deep below the world water level the floor should occur

fields.title: mid_material
fields.description: Controls the block type used in a layer below the surface of this biome

subForm.title: Mid Material
subForm.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

fields.title: sea_floor_material
fields.description: Controls the block type used as a floor for bodies of water in this biome

subForm.title: Sea Floor Material
subForm.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

fields.title: foundation_material
fields.description: Controls the block type used deep underground in this biome

subForm.title: Foundation Material
subForm.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

fields.title: top_material
fields.description: Controls the block type used for the surface of this biome

subForm.title: Top Material
subForm.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

fields.title: sea_material
fields.description: Controls the block type used for the bodies of water in this biome

subForm.title: Sea Material
subForm.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

fields.title: hard_clay_material
fields.description: Hardened clay block to use

subForm.title: Hard Clay Material
subForm.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

fields.title: clay_material
fields.description: Base clay block to use

subForm.title: Clay Material
subForm.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

fields.title: bryce_pillars
fields.description: Whether the mesa generates with pillars

fields.title: has_forest
fields.description: Places coarse dirt and grass at high altitudes
